products.title: Infusion Solar Ivory Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Their range of infusion solar pleated blinds is an excellent alternative to a venetian or roller blind. The solar feature means the blind will block sunlight and ultraviolet rays. The infusion solar ivory pleated skylight blind will transform the look of your home. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. Product id: db-pls0016 fabric colour: ivory headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.

products.title: Roller, 9050 Dark Blue - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Fully integrated into the roof window. For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience.
